cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking west-northwest across the southwest Atlantic and expected to turn northwest toward the southeastern U.S. (Carolinas) mid-week
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the North Carolina coast (around Cape Fear area)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern U.S. coast from Georgia northward through the Carolinas and into the Mid-Atlantic
weather_observation.wind: Outer rainbands could bring occasional gusts to near tropical-storm force late Thursday into Friday if the track shifts farther south.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at the Port of Brunswick under the current forecast track.
weather_observation.rainfall: Bands of moderate rain possible late Thursdayâ€“Friday with totals generally less than 2 inches.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along the Georgia coast beginning mid-week.
